c74object.name: o.checkumenutitem
c74object.description: Check if a given item exists in a umenu object, either through umenu's index number or symbols.

inlet.digest: Check if a given item exists under the connected umenu

outlet.digest: 1 if item exists and 0 if it doesn't

method.name: symbol
method.digest: Check for the given symbol in a connected umenu.
method.description: If the connected umenu contains the input symbol a 1 will be sent down the leftmost outlet, otherwise it will send a 0.

method.name: int
method.digest: It is also possible to check if there is any item in a given index.
method.description: If the connected umenu contains the input index a 1 will be sent down the leftmost outlet, otherwise it will send a 0.

entry.name: symbol
entry.description:
Out left outlet: A 1 if the input item exists or a 0 if it doesn't exist.
Out right outlet: connect to a umenu to read its items.
